Posts.Content: I have my appoitment date for the breast clinic I even know my consultants name its the 24TH october 12 days to go. Doctor was very concerned and admitted after I had a break down and refused to believe what he was saying his nearly 100% sure its cancer.
Posts.Title: Discharge from nipple

Posts.Content: I dont mean to be disgusting but need some advice my nipple is painful and I have discharge everyday I have to chsnge my bra and tops quite a lot each day because of it happening tried using plasters but that just made my nipple rub so had to stop! Please is this normal for someone who may have nipple cancer?
Posts.Title: Discharge from nipple

Posts.Content: Hello everyone, after tips I go to the breast screening unit tomorrow to have my tests to see if I have paget's and I cant sleep, last night was the worse I laid awake all night and all I could think off is "what happens if I have cancer" "is my daughter going to lose her mummy" and on and on. I keep telling myself its a cyst its not cancer and up to last night I coped well by saying this but now I cant get what if out of my head. Doesnt help that my hubby keeps getting angry when I try talking to him he sayd till the consultant says its cancer then to him it does not excists. Please I anyone can please give any advice on what I could do to sleep cant keep walking round like zombie andvi havr to drive later help please!!! I will try anything ps thanks once agaim for support
Posts.Title: Tried and scared

Posts.Content: Hi emily I am 37 and unlike yourself I never had lots of itching or dry skin. I noticed a change in my areola around my nipple but my sister whos a nurse told me to wait a few weeks before seeing gp as that was the only change then I felt the lump by and under my left nipple. Im also having a little discharge and aching pain which goes up under my armpit my nipple is also inverted. My gp as soon as he saw it told me told me were looking at cancer because I wouldnt believe after about 5 minute's he told me he was 99% sure it was cancee ,Im still hoping for a cyst have to think positive. Hope everything goes good for you would love to have a bath bit only have shower where we live so might pop over my parents house and borrow theres for a while. Add me as friend if you ever need to chat I understand how you must be feeling
Posts.Title: Tried and scared
